text: Allah oka drstantam istunnadu: Oka manavudu (banisa) parasparam virodhamunna ento mandi yajamanulaku cedinavadu. Maroka manavudu (banisa) purtiga oke okka yajamaniki cendina vadu, variddari paristhiti samananga untunda? Sarvastotralaku ar'hudu allah matrame! Kani varilo cala mandiki idi teliyadu
